title: LoL Team looking for a Manager

embed.description: The Legion Gaming Team is a not for profit organisation that donates any money it earns through competitive eSports ladders, competitive eSports affiliated teams, fund raisers, Twitch and YouTube to charity.

body:
LoL Team looking for a Manager
The Legion Gaming Team - Team Paragon is looking for someone to manage their league of legends team, Basically this means finding substitutes if needed, sponsors in the future, making sure everyone on the team is happy with the teams performance and their own performance and working with both the players and coaches to find what can improve the team overall.

Please Message me Ingame PGN Miracle or Email me at paragonesportslol@gmail.com with a application which should consist of Age, Previous team experience, rank (dosent really matter but for curiosity) and a short bio of yourself explaining how long you've played the game, what makes you want to manage a team and what you want to achieve by joining us.

- PGN Miracle
@PGNMiracle 
Team Captain and Support for Paragon eSports
